mapper.sql: id, mainhead,subhead, starttime, endtime, url, createdate,updatedate,type
mapper.select:
select , ( CASE WHEN now()>endtime THEN '已下线' WHEN starttime>now() THEN '预上线' WHEN (now()>starttime AND endtime>=now())THEN '上线中' ELSE '未知' END ) "status" from pk_ad where 1=1
AND mainhead like CONCAT('%',#{adMainHead},'%')
AND type=${type}
ORDER BY id DESC

select a.id as id ,b.name as name,b.position as position, ( CASE WHEN b.type = 1 THEN '队长' ELSE '队员' END ) "status" from pk_team_member a INNER JOIN pk_member b ON b.id=a.memberid
where a.teamid =${teamId}
